    • addResourceToPayment

      private void addResourceToPayment​(ResourceCount temporary, ResourceCount payment, ResourceCount cost)
      Parameters:
      temporary - ResourceCount that keeps track of the choices of the player (representing storage or chest)
      payment - ResourceCount that will contain the chosen resources to pay
      cost - amount of resources that need to be covered

    • takeResourcesFromMarket

      public void takeResourcesFromMarket()
      Called if the user decides to take resources from market The user must type "row" or "col" and the number of the chosen row/col Then, for every marble the user will choose what to do with it or, if there is only one choice possible, the method will print what happened
      Specified by:
      takeResourcesFromMarket in interface View

    • printFaithPathCell

      private void printFaithPathCell​(boolean playerIsHere, int victoryPoints, boolean isVaticanReport, int vaticanReportPoints)
      used to model the faith path
      Parameters:
      playerIsHere - indicates the player is on the specific cell
      victoryPoints - granted by surpassing the cell on the faith path
      isVaticanReport - is a Pope's dialogue cell that activates a vatican report
      vaticanReportPoints - points granted by the vatican report
